physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Radiographic evidence of severe rickets in the proband (III-1) at 19 months of age.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant improvement in the radiological signs of rickets after 12 months of treatment with 1-hydroxyvitamin D3 and sodium phosphate.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The father (II-1) had a history of hypophosphatemic rickets/osteomalacia, body height of 148.0 cm (below mean height for Japanese males).
The younger sister (III-2) exhibited laboratory results consistent with being unaffected.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: A repeat evaluation after 2 weeks demonstrated similar laboratory findings.
